description: Displays details about an import virtual machine or import snapshot tasks that are already created.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filter tasks using the task-state filter and one of the following values: active, completed, deleting, or deleted. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

parameters.name: ImportTaskIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the import image tasks. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ImportImageTasks
nested_items.description: A list of zero or more import image tasks that are currently active or were completed or canceled in the previous 7 days.

nested_items.name: Architecture
nested_items.description: The architecture of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the import task.

nested_items.name: Encrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image is encrypted.

nested_items.name: Hypervisor
nested_items.description: The target hypervisor for the import task.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) of the imported virtual machine.

nested_items.name: ImportTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the import image task.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the KMS key that was used to create the encrypted image.

nested_items.name: LicenseType
nested_items.description: The license type of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The description string for the import image task.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The percentage of progress of the import image task.

nested_items.name: SnapshotDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshots.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description for the snapshot.

nested_items.name: DeviceName
nested_items.description: The block device mapping for the snapshot.

nested_items.name: DiskImageSize
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in the snapshot, in GiB.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the disk image from which the snapshot is created.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The percentage of progress for the task.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The snapshot ID of the disk being imported.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A brief status of the snapshot creation.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed status message for the snapshot creation.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL used to access the disk image.

nested_items.name: UserBucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket for the disk image.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket from which the disk image was created.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: The file name of the disk image.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A brief status for the import image task.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A descriptive status message for the import image task.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the import image task.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: LicenseSpecifications
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the license configurations that are associated with the import image task.

nested_items.name: LicenseConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a license configuration.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The usage operation value.

nested_items.name: BootMode
nested_items.description: The boot mode of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to get the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
